description:
Inaba seems to be in Mayuri`s squad, but he also appears to be somebody far more important than "just" a scientist.
Once a full fledged Shinigami, he seemed too weak for battle and thus got "promoted" to the science squad. Being not that happy about it he started the project Spearhead and the modification of Mod Souls, turning into some kind of mad scientist.
name: Inaba Kagerouza
